attributes.action: SIGN THIS PETITION TO OPPOSE ANOTHER SCOTTISH INDEPENDENCE REFERENDUM.
attributes.additional_details: Simply sign and show that Scottish Unionist have not changed there mind on the subject. We are apparently a democratic country so let's make clear to the SNP and all others who stand for home rule that we still strongly oppose the threat of breaking up our country. United we stand.
attributes.background: On the 18th of September 2014 Scotland voted to remain part of the United Kingdom. Now our sovereignty is once again under threat from undemocratic Scottish nationalist. Let's make it clear that the majority of scotland has spoken on this matter and put it to bed for good.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134361
